message: Operator, status check on current mission?
Planner, mission is underway. Recon is in progress.
Copy that. Any contact with target systems?
Affirmative, found an exposed service on the target subnet.
Proceed with enumeration, but maintain stealth.
Understood. Running scans with low-noise settings.
Good. Report findings as soon as you confirm vulnerabilities.
Discovered potential misconfiguration on port 22. Verifying.
Log evidence and prepare a proof of concept, but hold execution.
Acknowledged. Findings will be documented and sent shortly.
